title: Severe thunderstorm watch in effect for parts of B.C. Interior

title: Hurricane Beryl leaves damage strewn across southeast Caribbean islands
description: Hurricane Beryl ripped doors, windows and roofs in homes across the southeast Caribbean after making landfall on the island of Carriacou as a Category 4.

title: Just 15 centimetres of water can float a car – but we are failing to educate drivers about the dangers of floodwaters
description: Understanding what to do when faced with flooding on the road is an important, yet often overlooked aspect of driver education, which could be the difference between life and death.
content:
Scherbinator, Shutterstock
Every year in Australia, people driving into floodwaters drown and many more are rescued. Do you know what to do when there’s water on the road?

title: Sudan's cocktail of war and flooding leaves people trapped, unable to flee
description: Millions of people have been forced out of Sudan as the brutal civil war continues to spread, including in Sinja Town, south of the capital Khartoum, where UN humanitarians reported on Tuesday that more than 55,000 people have already fled.
